text:
Hi Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
November 10, 1955
2nd Lt. Richard L* Spears
Chief, Radio-TV Branch
Office Information Services
Headquarters, Air Weather Service
Washington 25, D* C.
Dear Lt, Spearst
Should you have additional information or the
pilot tape, it would be helpful if we had it by the
end of this month* We*re having a small Program
Committee meeting*
Sincerely yours.
FESicu
Prank E* Schooley
President
